Welcome.title: Hats
Welcome.description: We are changing the way security works to fit the culture, nature, and de-facto development processes of Ethereum by incentivizing black hat to become white hat hackers.

SubmitVulnerability.pre-submission: Before submitting vulnerability please read the steps and process that your request will go through.
SubmitVulnerability.submission:
Your submission will be sent via a bot that is being run by the committee (i) who will process your submission.
The committee of the vault will respond <strong>within 12 hours<strong> to acknowledge the receipt of submission via the telegram user you provided.
